Title: Celebrate the fifth anniversary of the establishment of the Guangxi Tong minority autonomous region
Publisher: Guangxi Zhuangzu zizhiqu renmin chubanshe (广西僮族自治区人民出版社)
Notes: The building in the background his the Guangxi Zhuangzu Autonomous Region Exhibition Hall (广西僮族自治区展览館) in Nanning (南宁).
